short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple yet thrilling plane shooting game to test your reflexes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into 'Airplane Battle' - an intense aerial combat game where you maneuver your plane, dodge enemy aircraft, and shoot them down. With every enemy plane you defeat, your score rises. Test your skills and see how long you can survive!
